title: Covid-19 Vaccines and How They Work
author: Taylor Umlauf; Peter Loftus
description: There are more than a half dozen coronavirus vaccines in use or under development and they employ a variety of technologies.
cleaned_text: Seven coronavirus vaccines are rolling out across six continents to slow the global pandemic, and more are in late-stage testing. The shots use different technologies to help people mount the molecular defenses that can fend off Covid-19. Copyright ©2023 Dow Jones & Company, Inc.
